awd_titl_txt: An Experimental Study of Parallel and Distributed           Algorithms
awd_abstract_narration: The goal of this study is to understand techniques that lead                    to efficient parallel algorithms.  The methodology is                           experimental, performance is measured in terms of actual                        implementation.  A wide range of parallel architectures are                     considered.  The current work is on shared memory                               multiprocessors, and the plan is to expand the study to                         include non-shared memory machines and networks of                              workstations.  The application domains to be studied include                    combinatorial optimization, dynamic computational geometry                      (with applications to molecular dynamics simulation),                           rendering algorithms, and physical systems simulation.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations
